 Vampirtron:
     "Oh of course," Vampirtron said. "I hate to feed on other transformers, let alone on ones who have been kind to me. Maximals have shown me nothing but kindness in the past. I vow never to harm a Maximal. Predacons are another story."
  airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote: Nightlight::

"Promise me that you won't hurt my friends" said Nightlight "They 
saved me to death, please don't hurt them "


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Lestat Lioncourt <thevmprlestat2000@y...> wrote:
> 
> Vampirtron:
>      "Sorry," He said. "Another bit of programming that I am trying 
to rid myself of. You see, I'm something of a freak, I feed off other 
Transformers. I hate it, but I need to, it keeps me moving. I can 
explain all better when we reach your commander. But rest assured, 
you have nothing to fear from me, you took me in, I will only repay 
you in kindness."
> 
> 
>
